channel.title: [517] Realm-Zero PKing, Skilling Economy Server [517]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i64.servimg.com/u/f64/15/34/11/63/titel111.png[/img]
Realm-Zero 517 - PK/Skilling Server _______________________________
Positions:
[b]Owner[/b] 1/1 [b]Admins[/b]2/3 [b]Hoster[/b]1/1 [b]Coders[/b]1/2 [b]Website/Forums[/b] 1/1 _____________________
Realm-Zero is a PK/Skilling Spawn Economy Server (PSSE).
If you have an interest in joining our Server Team, please fill out this information below.
_________________________________________ Name: How old are you?: What are you applying for?: Any previous experience in this role?: MSN Contact Information?: _________________________________________
Here are some of the server features, and pictures taken by myself ;P
Features: 100% Bounty Hunter with Target Locate 100% Godswords and Dragon Claws with Special! 100% Vesta's Longsword and Vesta's Armor PvP Armors - Morrigans, Zurieals, Statius (with hammer and special) 100% Corpreal Beast 100% Kalphite Queen - Changes form! 100% PvP worlds Spawn Economy 100% Soul Split and Turmoil Clan Wars SAFE PKing Deep Wilderness PKing ALL SPIRIT SHIELDS Barrows Fishing Theiving Woodcutting AND MORE
Pictures:
[IMG]http://img821.imageshack.us/img821/7599/73608323.png[/img] [IMG]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/9513/allspiritshields.png[/img] [IMG]http://img193.imageshack.us/img193/710/88375085.png[/img] [IMG]http://img202.imageshack.us/img202/7393/cw1.png[/img] [IMG]http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/9528/ecodo.png[/img] [IMG]http://img291.imageshack.us/img291/470/form1.png[/img] [IMG]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27[/img] [IMG]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/2762/kbdj.png[/img] [IMG]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/6977/soulsplit[/img] [IMG]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/7461[/img]

item.title: [517] Realm-Zero PKing, Skilling Economy Server [517]
item.dc:creator: @Priv_Serv_Man Priv Serv Man
item.description:
@Priv_Serv_Man wrote:

Name: Patrick (Pat)
How old are you?: 15
What are you applying for?: Coder or admin
Any previous experience in this role?: I have been involved with many different servers for the past 3-4 years, with 2 years of on and off coding experience, working with 317 and 508. I made my own 317 and 508 but could never host them because of my router. I have been mod, admin co-owner on multiple servers and have much experience in that area as well.
MSN Contact Information?: 00mpa_lompas@live.com

P.S.
I am leaving today for a week at the beach (I know this seems like a bad time to apply) but I want to go ahead and get my application in. When i get back I will most likely be very active so you can count on me to be here for the server.

Read full topic
